## Objective

- Show that simulated measurement errors are distributed as predicted

```{r}
gg1 <- rt_valdata(rodir(14)) %>% 
  rt_val_hist(scale = TRUE, curve = TRUE, vars = c("height", "width"))

gg1$layers[[2]]$aes_params$size <- 1

gg1
```
